topic.title: Ceph ICE Virtual Machine Deployment
topic.shortdesc: The deployment of the Ceph virtual machine is performed using the deploy-ceph-vm.sh script. This script creates a kickstart file and then executes the virt-install command to install the system.

body.p: The generated kickstart script performs the following steps:

ul.li: Configures iptables to run on the system and disables firewalld
